title: Is it haram to watch “The Good Place” on Netflix? - Quora

response.answer_text: The question is … What do you believe? Sin, halal, and haram is a subjective measure and a moral imperative between you, your conscience, and your god… Exhibiting mindless compliance with interpretations of your clerics is the source of much of the criticism of the Islamic faith… irrational intellectual paralysis due to matters of religious practice and comparisons to other religions is the source of the bigotry by you and towards you.

Is it haram to watch The Good Place on Netflix? I honestly couldn’t tell you: I’m no Muslim, nor and kind of priest. I would suggest watching an episode or two, reading the show’s Wikipedia entry, and discussing it with your mosque’s Imam, or minister. That way, you have information and guidance you can act on.
